Reviews.Title: Great camera - but package could be better
Reviews.Author: Adrian A. Ramos
Reviews.Content: Camera itself is a brute - tough, durable and taskes great pics.  The package was not great - camera bag is for big cameras and film and other junk.  Camera strap with D-Ring (what is that for).  Needs a strap you can put on your wrist and not drop it or loose it when underwater scuba or snorkling.  FYI - battery drains fast when GPS is active.
